Help: Catalogue number

Help: Convenience grouping

Help: Length in mm

Help: Overall posture of moth

Label: Fore Wing Shape
Help: Approximate Fore-wing Shape

Label: Fore Wing Colour
Help: Ground colour using a colour wheel to determine the nearest root colour. Try to ignore hues and shades created by adding black or white to the root colour.

Label: Wing Texture
Help: Texture or lustre of the wing

Label: Basal
Help: Basal area of the wing

Label: Basal Stigmata
Help: Marks on the Basal area of the wing

Label: Antemedian
Help: Between the Basal and Median wing area

Label: Antemedian Stigmata
Help: Marks Between the Basal and Median wing area

Label: Median / Middle
Help: Middle of the wing

Label: Median / Middle Stigmata
Help: Mark on the Middle of the wing

Label: Postmedian
Help: After the middle

Label: Postmedian Stigmata
Help: Marks After the middle

Label: Terminal
Help: End region of the wing

Label: Terminal Stigmata
Help: Marks on the End region of the wing

Label: Apical
Help: Upper wing corner

Label: Apical Stigmata
Help: Marks on the Upper wing corner

Label: Subapical
Help: Near the upper wing corner

Label: Subapical Stigmata
Help: Marks Near the upper wing corner

Label: Tornal
Help: Trailing corner of the wing

Label: Tornal Stigmata
Help: Marks near the Trailing corner of the wing

Label: Subtornal
Help: Near the trailing corner of the wing

Label: Subtornal Stigmata
Help: Marks near the Trailing corner of the wing

Label: Costal
Help: Leading edge of the wing

Label: Costal Stigmata
Help: Marks near the Leading edge of the wing

Label: Subcostal
Help: Below the leading edge of the wing

Label: Subcostal Stigmata
Help: Marks Below the leading edge of the wing

Label: Medial
Help: Middle of the wing

Label: Medial Stigmata
Help: Marks near Middle of the wing

Label: Subdorsal
Help: Below the leading edge of the wing, above the trailing edge of the wing

Label: Subdorsal Stigmata
Help: Marks Below the leading edge of the wing, above the trailing edge of the wing

Label: Dorsal
Help: Trailing edge of the wing

Label: Dorsal Stigmata
Help: Marks on the Trailing edge of the wing

Label: Other Features
Help: Other distinctive features that may help confirm identification, but not included in the formal key.

Label: Filling Colour
Help: The colour of the filling which sandwiches the two biscuits together. Usually a single colour or but can be more than one colour e.g. a jam and cream filling.

Label: Width
Help: The width of the biscuit, measured in mm. If the biscuit is rectangular, measure the width along the shorter side.

Label: Length
Help: The length of the biscuit, measured in mm. If the biscuit is rectangular, measure the length along the longest side.

Label: How chocolatey?
Help: Indicate how chocolatey the biscuit is by selecting the best match from the list.
